subject: Question about order
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered racing pedals from simsonn.com last Monday, the 12th of January.
My order number is
#SSN6062. I just wanted to reach out because I still have not received
shipping confirmation. When could I expect them to be shipped?

conversations.body_text: Hi Snorri Ãžorvaldsson,    We apologize for the delay in shipping your order. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01360260524
